inscription:
Inscription

in plate below image in black: [Herman Van Swanevelt in. fe.   Cum pr. Re]; on mat above image in brown: [..re indebeted to Herman Swanevelt for several of the most beautiful etchings to/ be found in the portfolios of the Collection Bryan's Dict: of Engravers]; below image on mat in brown: [Les Pecheurs  Bartsch 77/ good impression V Supplement to Bartsch by Weigel p.35]; on verso of mount several inscriptions which do not relate to image above and below residue on verso
title: The Fishermen
